title: Rohingyas fleeing Myanmar arrive by boat in Bangladesh
description:
(29 Sep 2017) Dozens of refugees fleeing Myanmar were seen arriving by boat in neighbouring Bangladesh on Friday.
Of the 900,000 Rohingya Muslims in Bangladesh, more than 500,000 have arrived since August 25.
Bangladesh's UN ambassador said on Thursday that violence had not stopped in Myanmar's northern Rakhine state despite its government's claims.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/d6b36032b259b6230d8182c9192d2eb4
